Title: Health Science Fundamentals (Exploring Career Pathways)
Author: Chesebro & Badasch
Notes: Bundle of Student Edition, Activity Guide, and Lab Manual (best price $103.47 directly from Pearson - Visit pearsonprivateschools.com)

Uniform is provided by the school, billed through finance.  Athletic shoes are required to be worn in class. Street and skate shoes are not allowed.  The sole of the shoe should be hard and should not bend/fold.  No Text Required.
Athletic attire is required.  The attire does not need to be school uniform, but it must comply with the dress code: no tank tops, shorts must be an appropriate length.
